game.name: Reminiscence of Gusuku: Card and Explore
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Survive on a small island. Every choice reshapes your destiny in this deckbuilding roguelite. Stranded on an island said to gather everything that drifts ashore, you explore, build your deck, and push toward its deepest reaches.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive on a small island. Every choice reshapes your destiny in this deckbuilding roguelite. Stranded on an island said to gather everything that drifts ashore, you explore, build your deck, and push toward its deepest reaches.
